question.title: Kevin’s stack problem
question.content:
Kevin has recently learned the concept of “STACK”. During his practice, he got stuck in a problem where he has to reverse a string ‘S’ using a stack. So, he appoints you to help him in reversing the string ‘S’. All you have to do is to find the reversed string.

Please reverse the string using a stack so that Kevin gets to know where he is getting wrong after seeing your solution. It is guaranteed that strings will only be composed of English alphabets.

Input Format:
The first line contains a single integer ‘T’ representing the number of test cases. 

The first line of each test case will contain a string ‘S’.
Output Format:
For each test case, return the reversed string.

Output for every test case will be printed in a separate line.

Note:

You do not need to print anything, it has already been taken care of. Just implement the given function.
Constraints:
1 <= T <= 10
1 <= |S| <= 10^4

Time limit: 1 sec
Sample Input 1:
2
CODINGNINJAS
WelcomeToCodeStudio
Sample Output 1:
SAJNINGNIDOC
oidutSedoCoTemocleW
Explanation of sample input 1:
In the first test case, the reverse of the given string is “SAJNINGNIDOC”.

In the second test case, the reverse of the given string is “oidutSedoCoTemocleW”.
Sample Input 2:
3
A
Aa
aA
Sample Output 2:
A
aA
Aa
Explanation for sample input 2:
In the first test case, the reverse of the given string is “A”.

In the second test case, the reverse of the given string is “aA”.

In the third test case, the reverse of the given string is “Aa”.

rephrased.body: Kevin is learning about stacks and needs help reversing a string 'S' using a stack data structure. Given a string 'S' consisting of English alphabets, reverse the string using a stack and return the reversed string. Your solution should demonstrate the use of a stack to achieve the string reversal.
constraints: Strings will only be composed of English alphabets.

testcases.explanation: The reverse of the given string "CODINGNINJAS" is "SAJNINGNIDOC".
The reverse of the given string "WelcomeToCodeStudio" is "oidutSedoCoTemocleW".
The reverse of the given string "A" is "A".
The reverse of the given string "Aa" is "aA".
The reverse of the given string "aA" is "Aa".
The reverse of the given string "abc" is "cba".
The reverse of an empty string is an empty string.

hints: Put each character in the stack and then remove one by one.
